title: 105_s2631
content: Directs the Secretary of Commerce to establish a three-year toll free number pilot program to inform consumers about whether a product is made in America if the Secretary determines, based upon comments submitted in a certain rulemaking, that interest among manufacturers is sufficient to warrant such a program. Prescribes implementation procedures, including assessment of a civil penalty against any manufacturer who knowingly registers a product that does not comply with criteria under this Act.
